p.codeblock: public abstract int EnableInEarMonitoring(bool enabled, int includeAudioFilters);

section.p: This method is used to enable or disable in-ear monitoring.
This method enables or disables in-ear monitoring.
This method enables or disables in-ear monitoring.
section.note: Users must use headphones (wired or Bluetooth) to hear the in-ear monitoring effect.
Users must wear headphones (wired or Bluetooth) to hear the in-ear monitoring.
The user must use headphones (wired or Bluetooth) to hear the in-ear monitoring effect.
Users must use headphones (wired or Bluetooth) to hear the in-ear monitoring effect.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Can be called before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Enable/disable in-ear monitoring:
: Enable in-ear monitoring.
: (Default) Disable in-ear monitoring.
Type of in-ear monitoring audio filter. See .

Whether to enable in-ear monitoring:
: Enable in-ear monitoring.
: (Default) Disable in-ear monitoring.
The type of audio filter for in-ear monitoring. See .

Enable/disable in-ear monitoring:
: Enable in-ear monitoring.
: (Default) Disable in-ear monitoring.
The audio filter type for in-ear monitoring. See .

Enable/disable in-ear monitoring:
: Enable in-ear monitoring.
: (Default) Disable in-ear monitoring.
The type of audio filter for in-ear monitoring. See .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-8: Please ensure the current audio route is Bluetooth or headphones.

< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-8: Make sure the current audio route is set to Bluetooth or headphones.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
-8: Please ensure the current audio route is Bluetooth or headset.
